renderer::TextureClamping

renderer::TextureClamping Namespace Reference

Texture clamping modes.


Enumerations

enum  { CLAMP, CLAMP_TO_EDGE, CLAMP_TO_BORDER, REPEAT }

Enumeration Type Documentation

anonymous enum

Enumerator:
CLAMP  Clamp texture coordinates to [0,1].
CLAMP_TO_EDGE  Clamp texture coordinates to [0,1] using info about edges.
CLAMP_TO_BORDER  Clamp texture coordinates to [0,1] using info about borders (usefull with cubemapping).
REPEAT  Repeat texture coordinates.
